Controls:

W A S D - Move

Mouse - Aim

E - Pick up / Put down / Interact

Left Click - Light Attack

Hold Right Click - Aim while moving

Hold Right Click and press Left Click - Medium Attack

Q - Special Attack

Shift - Roll

R - Reload / Parry

F - Toggle flashlight
